text: phir (jab baradaasht na ho saka to) usake munkir ho gae khuda ne na to koee baheera (kaan phatee oontanee) muqarrar kiya hai na saayava (saandh) na vaseela (judava bachche) na haam (budha saandh) muqarrar kiya hai magar kuphfaar khuda par khvaah ma khvaah jhooth (mooth) bohataan baandhate hain aur unamen ke aksar nahin samajhate
